articles.title: Lotto Dstny drop 28mm tyres in light of hookless rim controversy - Global Cycling Network
articles.description: The team revealed the precautionary measure with Zipps 353NSW wheels ahead of Paris-Roubaix
articles.content:
Before the start of Paris-Roubaix the Belgium team of Lotto Dstny revealed they will exclusively race on 30mm tyres with its hookless rims.
